item.title: Operating Akkoma
item.description: A couple of months into self-hosting my Akkoma instance, I find myself doing a couple of operational tasks at a recurring basis. So might as well write them down here for future reference. Again, this is on my ARM-based machine with Ubuntu 22.04, where Akkoma is installed from source. Backing Up (Periodically) The doc’s backup instructions essentially says we should back up the database, plus a couple of configs and static files/directories.
